txt.en: The Gauredain believe that the grims are the wandering souls of those among their people who were cast out for their cowardice, damned to eternally wander the frozen snow-fields after they froze to death in the ice. Those few among the wise who know of these creatures, however, suspect that they are more likely fell spirits left wandering the northern wastes long after the fall of their ancient Dark Lord.
Your battles with the grims have revealed little of their true nature, save for their unrelenting hatred for creatures of warmth and light.
